title: Rahm Emanuel calls for mandatory retirement age for public officials — including him
description: The potential 2028 White House hopeful called for a mandatory retirement age of 75 for government officials, which would keep him from serving a second presidential term if elected.
content: The potential 2028 White House hopeful called for a mandatory retirement age of 75 for government officials, which would keep him from serving a second presidential term if elected.
